bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>What is the problem?</denchmark-h>
Seems like the actor class cannot be inherited from ABC superclass. <denchmark-h:h3>Reproduction (REQUIRED)</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>class A(ABC): def __init__(self,x): self.x = x
@ray.remote class B(A): def __init__(self,x): super().__init__(x)
b_instance = B.remote(1) </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20886355/88460417-5863bf80-cec6-11ea-8387-a699c9f8b873.png></denchmark-link>
PS. The issue does not appear if class A does not inherit the ABC
